content.rendered:
Anju Batra

Sr. Technical Recruiter

MBA in Marketing: AIMA, New Delhi

 

Hi, I’m Anju Batra. As a technical recruiter at ATR, I specialize in IT positions. My responsibilities include sourcing and recruiting activities, coordinating interviews, including pre-screening and preparing candidates for client interviews, supporting the on-boarding process, and post-hiring reviews with candidates. I am a people person and every day interaction with people from so many different backgrounds is great. Making a match between the client’s job needs and a contractors job aspirations is very satisfying.

 

ADVICE:

Advice for Candidates: My advice to job seekers: Prepare for your interview; visit the customer’s website and make sure you understand their business and strengths. Be honest when you present yourself, do your best and then leave it to God for the result.

 

Advice for Hiring Managers: Provide feedback on candidates quickly, because the market is moving fast and good candidates don’t last long in this market!

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“God is in Small Stuff” by Bruce & Stan
